content:
# After you arrive – checklist – Welcome Point

URL: https://wtp.agh.edu.pl/after-you-arrive-check-list/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:23:42

Welcome Point
 > 
Legal arrangements
 > 
After you arrive – checklist

After you arrive – checklist

Here you can find a list of the most important arrangements you should take care of right after you arrive in Poland. 
Click here
 to download.

Register in a municipal/district office competent for the address where you are residing

Sign a contract to rent a flat or dormitory at the AGH UST Campus (if you have not already done so)

Open a bank account in PLN (optional);

Sign an employment / civil law contract (if applicable);

Go to the academic unit you have come to (Faculty, Institute, Department, or meet with a specific AGH University researcher)

Obtain information on potential tax liabilities, health insurance and pension rights (if applicable)
